alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. John The Baptist and southeastern Tangipahoa Parishes through 115 PM CDT... At 1200 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Madisonville, or 14 miles southeast of Hammond, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Ponchatoula, Robert and Natalbany. This includes Interstate 12 between mile markers 41 and 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; St. John The Baptist
